word:
Frank, our earnest work is to be true to God and abide in Jesus 
                                                                           1471
and with Christ in God. One with God; what a privilege is this. Nov. 17, Dear Nephew, I am much relieved to receive your letter. I will send you copies of letters I have already written to several in Battle Creek. I send you these copies because I have labored hard here and under many perplexities and am not able to write you as largely as my heart is inclined to do.
